entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tensors in .NET #98323
  • [wasi] bump WASI SDK #98315
    9.0.0
  • [6.0] [warning] [android] [mono] libc.so.6 error - GLIBC_2.28 not found in node20, using node16 instead. Need OS upgrade. #98313
  • Support HttpClient custom logging outslide of HttpClientFactory #98312
  • [browser][MT] asynch dispatch soundness #98309
    9.0.0
  • [mono][marshal] Assertion should not be reached in mono_marshal_shared_conv_to_icall #98307
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] segfault in System.Linq.Tests #98292
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-jitstress] System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests fails with AV when `JitStress=2` #98290
    9.0.0
  • dotnot-host installer not found on system, cannot repair, install, fix or upgrade #98286
  • `INumber.Min(+QNaN, 1)` returns 1 #98285

Closed

  • System.DateTime.AddDays() adds additional tick #98305
  • Blazor Init Log Messages on Safari #93622
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Allow `WasmDebugLevel=0` for debug builds #94174
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WASM Custom debug configs need <DebuggerSupport Condition="''$(Configuration)' == 'DebugCustom'">true</DebuggerSupport> #96239
    8.0.x
  • Test duration reported by `dotnet test` is inaccurate for xUnit async tests #98205
  • NativeAOT: Reporting of the exceptions in the event viewer #73998
    9.0.0
  • Removal of PAL versions of floor, floorf, log, modf and modff has broken PAL test suite #98295
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml test failure on OSX #1417
    Future
  • LongContinuationChain_ContinueWith_DoesNotStackOverflow test failing on Mono in CI #2084
    9.0.0
  • `JIT/jit64/opt/rngchk/RngchkStress2.cs` failing to build with `error CS8078: An expression is too long or complex to compile` #87879
    9.0.0
  • Confusing NullReferenceException on default ImmutableArray #98300
  • Update pinned System.Reflection.Metadata and System.Collections.Immutable versions to 8.0.0 #96809
  • ToString() function in HttpQSCollection inside of System.Web.HttpUtility does not URL encode names #97826
    Future
  • [superpmi-collect] Widespread failures during collection #98287
    9.0.0
  • Can't build with libs.src+libs.ref on Windows #97029
    Future
  • NegotiateStream with ProtectionLevel.Sign failed in .NET 8 #97942
    9.0.0
  • [browser][AOT] wasm-ld : error : initial memory too small #96840
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Test timing out - `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToWasmPageWithoutAssetsComeBackAndHitAgain` #95343
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Text.Json.Tests` crashing inexplicably #89984
    9.0.0
  • Can't build COMReference with dotnet build #97125
  • "No LC_RPATH's found" when loading native libraries on macOS #96337

PullRequests

Created

  • Update unified build controls #98330
    needs-area-label
  • Delete unnecessary test exclusion #98329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #98328
    needs-area-label
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #98326
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #98325
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.28
  • JIT: update block weight for uncond to cond flow opt #98324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix remaining issues before enabling new EH by default #98322
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [VMR] Add metabuild properties to enable property-controlled VMR build modes. #98321
    source-build, area-Build-mono, needs-area-label
  • [Mono] [Amd64/WASM] Disable vector constructors intrinsics #98320
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Don't allow creating 1-byte dead basic blocks #98319
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't allow preinitialization to skip dataflow #98318
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Use the same code to emit Vector/Vector<T> intrinsics on … #98317
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GG_3A` to `SVE_GH_3A` #98316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make ordering an explicit part of `CountBy` and `AggregateBy` testing. #98311
    area-System.Linq
  • JIT ARM64 SVE: Add FZ_2A, HG_2A, GZ_3A, GV_3A, GY_3*, DV_4A #98310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Ensure the assert in IsEmbMaskOp is correct #98306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] preparation for deputy #98298
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Vector64: Avoid GSCookies in Vector64 software fallback #98293
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Log ManagedThreadId and NativeThreadId for known test failures #98291
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser

Merged

  • Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #97738
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Move more casts to the late cast expansion phase #98273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #96847
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Implement faster RSA key check #98010
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, os-linux, 8.0.3
  • Display names of handles in dumps #97573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null " #98221
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix missing short stack define #98128
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that Vector512 uses the same patterns as Vector64/128/256 #98115
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 8.0.3
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #97071
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98267
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98268
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98269
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Report unhandled exceptions/FailFast in event log #98152
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Intrinsify multiple LoadVector API's #98077
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Partial revert "Enable native AOT for non-portable crossgen2 (#97536)" #98303
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix PAL tests break #98301
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97927
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.x
  • avoid some allocations during TLS handshake #97348
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Update SqlClient and ship Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #97884
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.28
  • Remove SharedFramework test helper in host tests in favor of TestArtifact #98260
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix polluted CompareState when comparing element types in a signature #98249
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][debugger] Send assembly_load events while invoking methods using debugger-libs #98254
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.3
  • [wasm][bench] Fix Blazor First UI measurement #98308
    area-Build-mono
  • Change stack size on all desktop platforms to at least 1.5MB #98007
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix constant folding for arm64 MultiplyByScalar operations involving Vector2.One #98150
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Send assembly_load events while invoking methods using debugger-libs #98253
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Fix `Compiler::pickGDV` in `JitDump`/`EnableExtraSuperPmiQueries` #98289
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • Ensure that SetContainsAVX passes in the regSize #98283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix URL encoding of HttpUtility.ParseQueryString's ToString method #98263
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Cleanup NoWarn in Crossgen2Tasks.csproj #98294
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: isinst(cls, null) -> null #98284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build with Android 26 NDK (which has some nullability annotations) #97976
    area-System.Net, os-android, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix Windows implementation of NegotiateAuthenticationPal.GetMIC #98031
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Convert operand of newarr to int when producing reverse P/Invoke array marshalling #98025
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Build support for linux-bionic-arm / linux-musl-arm #97996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Spanify parts of IL reading in ILCompiler #97794
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fast FieldInfo reflection #98199
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance
  • Restore RSA 16384 tests to innerloop #98102
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Update where and when vzeroupper is emitted #98261
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FR_2A, GB_2A, FV_2A, FY_3A #98248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove C FILE PAL wrappers #98238
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Clear _cacheInvalid flag after rebuilding limiter cache in DefaultPartitionedRateLimiter #98075
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Use intrinsics in TensorPrimitives.PopCount for sizeof(T) == 1 #98281
    area-System.Numerics
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Support for WASI threads #98120
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #97070
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #97072
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for linux/arm64 #97910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #98134
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Initialize native layout info for small structs during type load #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Canonicalize loop exits #98096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use new MacOS arm64 pool for official builds #98117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix gc-related bugs in risc-v emitter #98226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
